thread.title: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang will head to London this week to team up with Manchester United striker Marcus Rashford
thread.title_full: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang will head to London this week to team up with Manchester United striker Marcus Rashford

author: Matt Lawless
title: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang will head to London this week to team up with Manchester United striker Marcus Rashford
text:
Aubameyang with his new Nike boots (Photo: NIKE) Share Get football updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang will head to London this week - but Dortmund fans can relax for now. 
The striker, 27, has been linked with a move to the Premier League at the end of the season. 
Both Liverpool and Manchester City are believed to be keen on securing the Gabon international’s services. 
But he will partner Manchester United forward Marcus Rashford and Tottenham hitman Harry Kane at an exclusive event for his boot suppliers Nike on Wednesday. 
Inter Milan ace Mauro Icardi will join Aubameyang too as they compete in a head-to-head finishing competition that will be webcast on Facebook Live Aubameyang will be in London this week (Photo: Alexandre Simoes) The Dortmund hitman has attracted Premier League interest (Photo: Lars Baron) 
The stylish black and red Hypervenom 3 Strike Night boots are at the heart of the competition which the strikers will model in their next games. 
Aubameyang loves them so much, he revealed he even takes them on holiday! 
"The boots are the of the utmost importance for a footballer. Even when on vacation, I bring them along,” he said. 
"They are built for finishing. And of course, they should have style.” 
Courtesy of Nike, here’s a full Q&A with the Borussia Dortmund striker. The new Hypervenom 3 Strike Night boots (Photo: NIKE) Harry Kane will also model the new boots (Photo: 2017 Getty Images) Q. What do you look for/what is important in the HV3 boot? 
I love the material of the boot, especially the material that touches the ball. In this respect, the HV3 echoes the original Hypervenom. Q. How much impact does the boot have in the way you move? What do you need most from the boot? 
The boots are the of the utmost importance for a footballer. Even when on vacation, I bring them along. They are built for finishing. And of course, they should have style. Q. What does it take to become a great finisher (in 5 words) 
Work, feeling, placement, speed… and of course having the goal in your head all the time. Read More Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang hooked from Borussia Dortmund defeat at Benfica because of 'body language' Q. Describe your greatest goal – how and when? 
I have scored a lot - but if I remember one it was on March 17, 2016 against Tottenham - the day my grandfather passed away. Q. Tell us about the feeling you experience each time you score… 
It is an inexplicable sensation it depends on the moment of beauty of the goal, and of the emotion of the match. The only thing I can remember is that it is one of the most beautiful things in the world. poll loading Will Aubameyang be in the Premier League next year? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
